title: Looking for players for competitive team Gold+
body:
Me and a friend are starting up a ranked team. You have to be semi serious about it. (in other words try to take it serious)

Whether or not the people chosen to be in the ranked team do well/work well with the team. We will make a competitive serious team.

Open roles:
Jungle
Support
Top

Closed Roles:
MID
ADC

If you'd like one of the closed roles, you can sub.

Application form(copy & paste exact and fill out pls:
Age:
Location:
Preferred role:
Rank last season:
Rank this season:
Played for(how many years/months):
Skype/Teamspeak:


Last and not least. Do not add me. I will add you. If you add me I will decline.
